entities.name: Memory MCP Server
observations: Official MCP server for persistent memory capabilities
Repository: https://github.com/modelcontextprotocol/servers/tree/main/src/memory
Should be used for storing and retrieving contextual information across sessions
Provides knowledge graph functionality with entities, relations, and observations
Available tools: create_entities, create_relations, add_observations, delete_entities, delete_observations, delete_relations, read_graph, search_nodes, open_nodes

entities.name: Claude Code Memory Usage
observations: Always use the Memory MCP server tools for persistent information storage
Store important project context, patterns, and learnings in the knowledge graph
Use entities to represent concepts, tools, patterns, or important information
Use relations to show connections between entities
Use observations to add detailed information about entities
Prefer memory storage over temporary notes for information that should persist across sessions
Updated guidelines: Only store information when explicitly requested by user or when user indicates it should be memorized
Include timestamp (date and time) when saving memories
Automatically clean up and remove memories older than 30 days

entities.name: Weaverse
observations: Comprehensive multi-component ecosystem for headless CMS and e-commerce development
Consists of several interconnected applications and SDKs
Primary focus on Shopify integration and headless commerce
Visual website builder with React Router v7
Supports theme development with live preview capabilities

entities.name: Weaverse Builder
observations: Universal Website Builder v2.12.1
Uses React Router v7 and visual editor
Located in /builder/ directory
Main development command: pnpm dev
Includes studio integration and preview system
Uses PlanetScale database with Prisma (no migrations, use db push)

entities.name: Weaverse SDKs
observations: Monorepo containing packages for React/Shopify integration
Located in /weaverse/ directory
Uses pnpm with changesets for package management
Provides createSchema() function for component development
Includes @weaverse/hydrogen package for Shopify integration

entities.name: Weaverse Agent
observations: WebSocket CLI tool for bridging Weaverse Studio and local development
Located in /agent/ directory
Migrated from Bun to npm in June 2025
Connects on port 9797
Requires WEAVERSE_PROJECT_ID environment variable
Enables real-time file sync between local theme and studio
